mealPrepInfo.groceryList:
1. 2 lean chicken breasts
2. 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil
3. 2 cloves fresh garlic, minced
4. 1/2 cup low-fat milk
5. 1 whole grain pie crust
6. 2 cups fresh mixed vegetables
mealPrepInfo.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F.
2. Rinse and pat dry 5 chicken breasts.
3. Season each side of the chicken with salt and pepper.
4. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pan on medium-high heat.
5. Sear the chicken for 4 minutes on each side.
6. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes until the internal temperature reaches 165°F.
8. While the chicken is baking, chop 2 bell peppers, 1 onion, and 3 cloves of garlic.
9. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in the same pan over medium heat.
10. Add the chopped vegetables and sauté for 5 minutes.
11. Season the vegetables with salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon of dried herbs.
12. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes.
13. Slice each chicken breast into thin strips.
14. Divide the chicken and vegetables evenly into 5 meal prep containers.
15. Store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
